nodes.text: A blind giant resided on the planet Mustafar. The giant's eyes were squeezed shut, preventing it from being able to see, but it was locked in symbiosis with the spidery Eye of Webbish Bog, which caused the giant pain. When Supreme Leader Kylo Ren encountered the two creatures while searching for the Sith wayfinder of Darth Vader, he guessed that the giant was under the control of the Eye of Webbish Bog, but could not survive without it.
